properties.name: app.gateway.ip
properties.description: IP of the api gateway allowed to make request through the auth system.

properties.name: app.gateway.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key used by api gateway to access auth service.

properties.name: app.gateway.header.gateway-secret
properties.description: Secret key in api-gateway headers requests.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: jsonwebtoken secret key for this app.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Time before the expiration of the token.
